name: Poor Choices Full Game
description:
Poor Choices is a tough platformer that has the main character Jim, adventure through a scary mansion while being chased by the terrible Skelton. Go through 5 unique areas with 50+ levels and 2 endings. See if you can find the 4 secret levels!

(ctrl + f = fullscreen)

(The mouse only works to toggle the volume sliders in game, it has no other use)(use the middle mouse button to scroll through percentages)
